messages.changePasswordHint: Enter your current password and a new password and confirm the new password.
messages.changeUsernameHint: Here you can change your username. Type in your new username and your current password and click on save to change it.
messages.expimpHint: Here you can export your bookmarks (HTML/JSON) and import them again (JSON). This allows you to save and restore your data in a local backup at any time.
messages.title: Title
messages.ntfy: Please enter the ntfy url including the topic and the token
messages.accessDeniedHint: Access denied. You must login to use this tool.
messages.loginFailedHint: You must authenticate to use this tool.
messages.forgetPassword: Forgot your password? You can try to reset it.
messages.forgetPasswordAdmin: Forgot your password? Please contact the admin.
messages.welcomeHint: Please use your credentials to login to SyncMarks
messages.resetCancelHint: Password reset canceled. You can still login with your old password.
messages.resetSuccessHint: Password reset successful, please check your mail. You can login now with your new password.
messages.tokenExpired: Token expired, Password reset failed. You can try to reset it again.
